bibl.title: assisted by Jill PHILLIPS and Penny COPELAND, with contributions by several authors, Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic Ports on the Red Sea. Volume 1: Survey and Excavations 1999-2003.
bibl.note: Excavations conducted by the University of Southampton, 1999-2003. - Part I. The Region and the Site. - Part II. The Excavations. - Bibliography. - Pp. 17-26: Wilfried VAN RENGEN, David PEACOCK, Doug MURPHY and Julian WHITEWRIGHT, Rock Art and Inscriptions; - 146-154: Wilfried VAN RENGEN and Ross THOMAS, The Sebakh Excavations. [The finds include papyrus and ostraca.]

PEACOCK David and Lucy BLUE, assisted by Jill PHILLIPS and Penny COPELAND, with contributions by several authors, Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic Ports on the Red Sea. Volume 1: Survey and Excavations 1999-2003.
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 2006, 4°, viii-180 pp., tabl., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 1-84217-203-4. £40.
